full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGAGS KYI BKLAG THABS BSDUS PA SNAR THANG LO TZ'A BAS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,SNGAGS KYI KLOG THABS ZHES BYA BA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR YI GE KLOG PA'I THABS, ,SNAR THANG KLOG THABS MDOR BSDUS 'DI, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM DU, ,BYANG CHUB BLO GSAL DPAR DU BSGRUBS, ,'DI YI DGE BA'I NYIN BYED SNANG, ,'GRO KUN MA RIG MUN SEL TE, ,KUN KYANG KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG DU, ,BGROD PA GCIG CHAR NYID GYUR CIG , ,,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,
